short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for checking Competitive programming contests schedule organized by various platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get every contest schedule details at one place
Shows schedule for today's and upcoming contests
Simple dropdown menu for filtering by platforms
Supports nearly every contest platform
Minimal Dark UI
Blazing fast!

Updates-
Fixed minor bugs.
